name: Diva Girls: Diva Dancers
overview: It’s all in the beat. The Diva Girls are heading to the bright lights of Fiesta City ready to bust some moves and enter the greatest dance competition in the world. It’s not going to be easy though and along the way they must face-off against B-boys, bullies, princesses and showgirls. If they make it through then the girls must take on the hardest challenge of all and compete against each other –will their friendship survive? FEATURES Touch-screen rhythm action New steps and moves 14 locations, each with their own champion dancer to defeat New music to dance to Story mode, quick play and multiplayer modes Challenge your friends to a dance-off
